name: The Crab Man: Complete Edition
description:
You Wake up as a crab in a strange factory, your only objective is to escape, what could go wrong? 

What the complete edition includes:

-4 Full Chapters

-2 Different Boss Fights

-And a secret mode 👀

Crab Man is an indie game where you turn into a crab in the crab factory, and all you have to do is escape, but not free from dangers.
